title: Excitonic switches operating at around 100 K
title_cn: 励磁开关工作在大约100 K
abstract: Photonic and optoelectronic devices may offer the opportunity to realize efficient signal processing at speeds higher than in conventional electronic devices. Switches form the building blocks for circuits, and fast photonic switches have been realized. Recently, a proof of principle demonstration of exciton optoelectronic devices was reported. The potential advantages of excitonic devices include high operation and interconnection speed, small dimensions and the opportunity to combine many elements into integrated circuits. Here, we demonstrate experimental proof of principle for the operation of excitonic switching devices at temperatures around 100 K. The devices are based on an AlAs/GaAs coupled quantum well structure and include the exciton optoelectronic transistor (EXOT), the excitonic bridge modulator (EXBM), and the excitonic pinch-off modulator (EXPOM). A two orders of magnitude increase in the operation temperature compared to earlier devices (1.5 K; refs ) is achieved.
abstract_cn: 光子和光电设备可以提供以比常规电子设备更高的速度实现有效信号处理的机会。开关构成电路的基础，并且已经实现了快速光子开关。最近，报道了激子光电器件原理演示的证明。激子器件的潜在优势包括高操作和互连速度，小尺寸以及将许多元件组合成集成电路的机会。在这里，我们演示了激子开关装置在100 K附近的温度下工作原理的实验证明。这些器件基于AlAs / GaAs耦合量子阱结构，包括激子光电晶体管（EXOT），激子桥调制器（EXBM）和激子夹断调制器（EXPOM）。与早期的设备（1.5＆＃160; K refs＆＃160;）相比，工作温度提高了两个数量级。

title: Ultrafast waveform compression using a time-domain telescope
title_cn: 使用时域望远镜的超快速波形压缩
abstract: Photonic systems provide access to extremely large bandwidths, which can approach a petahertz. Unfortunately, full utilization of this bandwidth is not achievable using standard electro-optical technologies, and higher (>100 GHz) performance requires all-optical processing with nonlinear-optical elements. A solution to the implementation of these elements in robust, compact and efficient systems is emerging in photonic integrated circuits, as evidenced by their recent application in various ultrahigh-bandwidth instruments. These devices enable the characterization of extremely complex signals by linking the high-speed optical domain with slower speed electronics. Here, we extend the application of these devices beyond characterization and demonstrate an instrument that generates complex and rapidly updateable ultrafast optical waveforms. We generate waveforms with 1.5-ps minimum features by compressing lower-bandwidth replicas created with a 10 GHz electro-optic modulator. In effect, our device allows for ultrahigh-speed direct 270 GHz modulation using relatively low speed devices and represents a new class of ultrafast waveform generators.
abstract_cn: 光子系统提供对超大带宽的访问，该带宽可能接近PB。不幸的是，使用标准的电光技术无法实现该带宽的充分利用，并且更高的性能（＆gt; 100＆＃160; GHz）要求具有非线性光学元件的全光处理。在光子集成电路中，正在出现一种在坚固，紧凑和高效的系统中实现这些元件的解决方案，最近在各种超高带宽仪器中的应用证明了这一点。这些设备通过将高速光域与速度较慢的电子设备链接在一起，从而能够表征极其复杂的信号。在这里，我们将这些设备的应用扩展到了特性之外，并演示了一种能够生成复杂且可快速更新的超快光波形的仪器。我们通过压缩由10＆＃160GHz电光调制器创建的较低带宽副本来生成具有1.5ps最小特征的波形。实际上，我们的设备允许使用相对低速的设备进行超高速直接270-1＃160; GHz调制，代表了一种新型的超快速波形发生器。

title: Low-divergence single-mode terahertz quantum cascade laser
title_cn: 低发散单模太赫兹量子级联激光器
abstract: The operation of quantum cascade lasers has to date been demonstrated over a broad frequency range in the terahertz spectrum (from 4.4 THz to 1.2 THz). Most potential applications of terahertz quantum cascade lasers require a source that has an excellent spatial and spectral control of the radiated emission. Here, we present a distributed feedback design of a double-metal waveguide quantum cascade laser that features a grating resonant with the third-order Bragg condition. We show that an improvement of the extraction efficiency results in control of the laser emission wavelength and enhanced output power. Moreover, the grating can act as an array of phased linear sources, reshaping the typical wide and patterned far-field of double-metal waveguides into a narrow beam of ∼10° divergence.

title: Far-ultraviolet plane-emission handheld device based on hexagonal boron nitride
title_cn: 基于六方氮化硼的远紫外平面发射手持设备
abstract: Many researchers have been trying to produce highly efficient solid-state devices with longer operating lives for the far-ultraviolet wavelength region as an alternative to conventional far-ultraviolet lamps. However, owing to the low efficiency of far-ultraviolet operation, research continues into the development of far-ultraviolet devices with sufficiently high performance. Here, the potential of hexagonal boron nitride as a far-ultraviolet fluorescent material is studied. Specifically, taking advantage of the highly luminous properties of hexagonal boron nitride, a far-ultraviolet plane-emission compact device equipped with a field-emission array as an excitation source is fabricated, and its stable operation with an output power of 0.2 mW at 225 nm demonstrated. Because of its low current consumption in operation, the device can be driven by dry batteries. This convenient far-ultraviolet device is likely to prove extremely useful in photochemical and biotechnological applications such as photocatalysis, sterilization and modification of chemical substances.
abstract_cn: 许多研究人员一直在尝试生产出在远紫外波长区域具有更长使用寿命的高效固态器件，以替代传统的远紫外灯。然而，由于远紫外线操作效率低，因此继续研究具有足够高性能的远紫外线设备。在此，研究了六方氮化硼作为远紫外荧光材料的潜力。具体地，利用六方氮化硼的高发光特性，制造了配备有场发射阵列作为激发源的远紫外平面发射紧凑型装置，并且其稳定的操作具有0.2＆＃160的输出功率。展示了225 nm的mW。由于其运行中的电流消耗低，因此该设备可以由干电池驱动。这种方便的远紫外线设备可能被证明在光化学和生物技术应用中非常有用，例如光催化，化学物质的灭菌和改性。

title: Electrically tunable liquid crystal optical microresonators
title_cn: 电可调液晶光学微谐振器
abstract: Because of their small mode volume and high Q-factors, optical microresonators are interesting for applications such as laser sources, active filters and all-optical switches. Especially interesting are tunable resonators, in which the resonance frequency tuning by size, shape, temperature or electric field can be achieved. Here we demonstrate electrically tunable, low-loss whispering-gallery-mode (WGM) resonators made of nematic liquid crystal droplets, embedded in a polymer matrix. The shift in resonant frequencies is achieved via electric field-induced structural distortion of the birefringent liquid crystal resonator medium. Nematic liquid crystal microresonators have a large tuning range of the order of 20 nm at 2.6 V µm−1 for a ∼600 nm WGM in 17-µm-diameter droplets and high Q-factors up to ∼12,000 in 33-µm-diameter droplets. The tunability is approximately two orders of magnitude larger than usually achieved in solid-state microresonators.
abstract_cn: 由于光学微谐振器的模式体积小且具有高Q因子，因此对于诸如激光源，有源滤波器和全光开关等应用非常有趣。特别令人关注的是可调谐振器，其中可以实现根据尺寸，形状，温度或电场对谐振频率进行调谐。在这里，我们演示了由向列型液晶液滴制成的，嵌入聚合物基体中的电可调谐，低损耗的耳语画廊模式（WGM）谐振器。谐振频率的偏移是通过电场引起的双折射液晶谐振器介质的结构变形来实现的。向列型液晶微谐振器在2.6＆＃160; V＆＃160;＆＃181; m ＆＃8722; 1 时的＆＃8764调谐范围较大，约为20nm在直径为17微米的液滴中具有600 nm的WGM，在直径为33微米的液滴中具有高达12,000的高Q因子。该可调性比固态微谐振器通常达到的大约大两个数量级。
